name: Rick and Morty: Virtual Rick-ality
description: Rick and Morty: Virtual Rick-ality smashes together the absolute VR chaos of the award-winning Job Simulator with the ridiculous, all-out, take-no-prisoners comedy of Rick and Morty.
minimum_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon RX 480
recommended_requirements: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system Processor: i7-4770 Graphics: GTX 980 equivalent
